sentence.Network_en: The minister has just published the banns of marriage at the church.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧师刚刚在教堂宣布了结婚公告.

sentence.Network_en: Usually the banns are put up in church for three weeks.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般婚事连续3个星期在教堂公布.

sentence.Network_en: The banns of their marriage were put up outside the registry office.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的婚事在结婚登记处外宣布了.

jx.jx_en_mean: (archaic)raise an objection to an intended marriage, especially in church following the reading of the banns

entry.def: When a minister or priest reads or publishes the banns, he or she makes a public announcement in church that two people are going to be married.

means.word_mean: 1. a public announcement of a proposed marriage
